I've come across a design I want to implement as a radial thruster with gimballing, however I'm not quite sure how to go about it the way I want.

> ![JM4VkeC.png](http://i.imgur.com/JM4VkeC.png)

Basically, I want Axis A and B to rotate individually and have the thrust vector tied in to the rotation of Axis A. The final design won't resemble a gyroscope as such however I want it to have a similar mechanism. Cheers for the help!
